sentences.english: End uses of warp knitted fabrics from glass filament.
sentences.chinese: 玻纖復絲經編針織物的用途。

sentences.english: You are the most loving and caring person any friend could ever have.
sentences.chinese: 您是夫復何求最可愛最貼心的朋友。

sentences.english: However, asynchronous interaction pushes more complex error handling onto the consumer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，異步交互將更復雜的錯誤處理推給了用戶。

sentences.english: The calculated results of energy gap on alkaline earth mixed halides are reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 對鹼土金屬復鹵化物的能隙進行了計算，結果合理。

sentences.english: These results indicate that the yeast transcriptome is more complex than previously appreciated.
sentences.chinese: 這些結果表明酵母轉錄組比以前描述的更復雜。

sentences.english: Sharks cruised toward her lone figure, only to be driven away by rifle shots.
sentences.chinese: 鯊魚遊向她孤單的身軀，只能靠來復槍來擊退。

sentences.english: The development of this condition is directly related to the length of time a patient is taking metoclopramide and the number of doses taken.
sentences.chinese: 病情的進展與患者服用胃復安的時間和劑量成正相關。

sentences.english: And I hear it gets even more complicated once they’re smoked.
sentences.chinese: 而我聽說一旦被燻烤之後情況就更復雜。

sentences.english: I want to reply to the person's request .
sentences.chinese: 我想要回復那人的請求。

sentences.english: Airplanes grounded because of the fog have already taken off.
sentences.chinese: 受到大霧影響而停飛的班機已全部復航。

sentences.english: Compound Iron Fertilizers had significant effects on rectifying peanuts chlorosis caused by iron deficiency.
sentences.chinese: 復混鐵肥土施矯治石灰性土壤花生缺鐵黃化效果顯著。

sentences.english: The exit goods for processing shall be shipped back to China within the time limit as prescribed by the customs.
sentences.chinese: 出境加工貨物應當在海關規定的期限內復運進境。

sentences.english: Select all six frames and duplicate.
sentences.chinese: 複製這六個幀，進行復制。

sentences.english: Coincidentally, Li Fuxiu and Chen Zhongqiang met literature Ning, also from the chase after.
sentences.chinese: 事有湊巧，李復修及陳忠強遇見文學寧，亦從後追去。

sentences.english: For more information please check the appendix.
Practice keeping your life simple and uncomplicated.
sentences.chinese: 嘗試着保持生活簡單不復雜。
